title: POINT_CAM_AT_COORD
content:
0xF75497BB865F08030x914BC21A// PointCamAtCoord
void POINT_CAM_AT_COORD(Cam cam, float x, float y, float z);Examples:Lualocal coords = vector3(402.99, -998.02, -99.00)
local cam = CreateCamWithParams("DEFAULT_SCRIPTED_CAMERA", coords.x, coords.y, coords.z, 0.00, 0.00, 0.00, 50.00, false, 0)
PointCamAtCoord(cam, coords.x, coords.y, coords.z)
codeBlocks:
// PointCamAtCoord
void POINT_CAM_AT_COORD(Cam cam, float x, float y, float z);

local coords = vector3(402.99, -998.02, -99.00)
local cam = CreateCamWithParams("DEFAULT_SCRIPTED_CAMERA", coords.x, coords.y, coords.z, 0.00, 0.00, 0.00, 50.00, false, 0)
PointCamAtCoord(cam, coords.x, coords.y, coords.z)
